response.overview: A commercial promoting Schicht's margarine Vitello.  The Schicht's commercial character - a doll - prepares a sweet and a salty cake using the brand margarine Vitello and following the recipes in a book.  The commercial was filmed by the German Excentric Film Berlin company for the company Centra Děčín. The application for the censorship approval was submitted by the Brother Degl's Prague company. The German distribution title Die Gute Vitello Küche originates from the surviving copy with German subtitles, while the title Die Beste Küche Vitello comes from the censorship files.
response.title: Vitello, the Good Cuisine
